title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Tyre classification and performance, function of pneumatic tyre. Component, terminology, tyre material. Tyre reinforcement, tyre cord construction, fabric processing. Tyre design, tyre mechanics, tyre friction and wear hydroplaning. Caracas design, contour shape, cord path and their characteristics. Cord tension. Load capacity of tyre. Stresses in Tyre. Tread design, Bead design, bead tension, Tyre mold design. Compound design for various parts of tyre and different types of tyre. Tyre manufacturing, Tyre building, Curing finishing. Tyre testing. Laboratory test, proving ground, inspection of tyre, Radial, giant tyres. tubeless tyres, Aerotyres
